Title: Refraining from intrusive thoughts is strategy dependent: a comment on sugiura, et al. and a preliminary informal test of detached mindfulness, acceptance, and other strategies
Author: Wells, Adrian; Roussis, Panagiotis
ResultSummary: Detached mindfulness group showed lower intrusions than the control group

Title: The role of dissociation in the development and maintenance of post-traumatic stress disorder (bl)
Author: Murray, J.
ResultSummary: There were no significant differences between the three groups in terms of number of intrusions at 6 months follow-up
